com.artemis

Class ArchetypeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.ArchetypeBuilder

  • public class ArchetypeBuilder
extends Object
    Builder for basic Archetype instances. To reap the maximum benefit of Archetypes, it's recommended to stash them away inside an manager or similar. Archetypes main advantage come from the improved insertion into systems performance. Calling edit() on the Entity returned by World.createEntity(Archetype) nullifies this optimization.

    Generated archetypes provide a blueprint for quick entity creation. Instance generated entities using World.createEntity(Archetype)

    Since:
    0.7
